entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
